function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation systems in residential buildings","Impact":"Increased risk of airborne disease transmission","Mitigation":"Implementing efficient and robust ventilation systems, including air filtration and circulation","Technologies":"High-efficiency particulate air (HEPA) filters, energy recovery ventilators, smart ventilation controls","People":"Residents, building occupants","Owner":"Architects, building developers, facility managers"},{"Description":"Inflexible building design and layout","Impact":"Difficulty in adapting buildings for infection control measures","Mitigation":"Designing flexible building developments to allow for easy modification of layout and facilities","Technologies":"Modular construction, adaptable building systems, flexible infrastructure design","People":"Architects, building developers, facility managers","Owner":"Architects, building developers, facility managers"},{"Description":"Ineffective noise and vibration control measures","Impact":"Potential for noise pollution and disturbance, impacting mental well-being and overall health","Mitigation":"Implementing effective noise and vibration control measures, including sound insulation and absorption","Technologies":"Sound-absorbing materials, anti-vibration mounts, noise-reducing construction techniques","People":"Residents, building occupants","Owner":"Architects, building developers, facility managers"}]}
